Headline: #156 LaSalle Temporary Southbound Reroute near Belmont/Hudson
ShortDescription: SB 156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound 1#56 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute near Belmont/Hudson
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont rrtd EB via Blmnt, Hlstd, Addison, In. Lk Shore Dr & Sheridan: WB via Blmnt, In. Lk Shore Dr, Addison, Hlstd & Blmnt due to blockage nr Blmnt/Hudson

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan
  • Westbound buses will operate via Belmont, Inner Lake Shore Drive, Addison, Halsted and Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Major Delays, Limited Service on Loop 'L'
ShortDescription: Major delays/limited service capacity on the Loop 'L' due to signal problems at Adams/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Major delays/limited service capacity on the Loop 'L' due to signal problems at Adams/Wabash.

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service. Shuttle bus service is as follows:

  • Brown Line shuttle buses will be available from Fullerton to Clark/Lake
  • Green Line shuttle buses are available from Cermak-McCormick Place to State/Lake
  • Orange Line shuttle buses are available from Halsted to Clark/Lake
  • Pink Line shuttle buses are available from Clinton to Clark/Lake.

Note: Trains and platforms may be busier than usual and become crowded at times. For your safety, please stand clear of the platform edge.

We appreciate your patience as we work to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
